meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels clearly show 02271.1, which is 2271.1 m³. The small red pointer dial has major marks labeled 0.00, 0.01, 0.02, etc. and five minor ticks between each major mark (each representing 0.002 m³). The needle is pointing between the 0.02 and 0.03 marks. Specifically, it is at approximately the 3rd minor tick past 0.02, indicating a value of 0.026 m³. Following the rule to interpolate to 0.01 resolution and choosing the closest value, 0.026 rounds to 0.03 m³. The '0.00' mark is approximately at 10:30 o'clock (285 degrees clockwise from 12 o'clock). The needle is approximately at 5:40 o'clock (170 degrees clockwise from 12 o'clock). The clockwise angle of the needle relative to the '0.00' mark is calculated as (170 - 285 + 360) = 245 degrees.
